content.user_title: Implement adaptive agent learning with ReasoningBank
content.value_statement: Agent performance plateaus without learning from experience. ReasoningBank captures decision trajectories, extracts patterns, and trains models to continuously improve agent strategies over time.
actual_capabilities: Initialize ReasoningBank with trajectory tracking schema and verdict criteria
Capture agent decision trajectories with thought-action-observation sequences
Extract patterns using vector similarity clustering (cosine similarity)
Train decision models using 9 reinforcement learning algorithms
Generate and apply strategy recommendations based on validated patterns
Benchmark performance and validate improvements exceeding 15%
limitations: Requires external dependencies: reasoningbank, agentdb, claude-flow packages
Pattern extraction requires sufficient trajectory data (minimum 10-20 samples)
Performance gains depend on trajectory quality and diversity
AgentDB integration is optional but recommended for 150x faster operations

output_examples.input: Initialize ReasoningBank and capture 20 agent trajectories
output: Learning system initialized with 20 trajectories captured
Pattern extraction: 5 clusters identified (85% similarity threshold)
Top pattern: error recovery sequence (92% success rate)
Decision model trained: 100 epochs, 32 batch size
Integration guide generated and model exported

best_practices: Collect diverse trajectories including both successful and failed attempts for balanced learning
Validate patterns with at least 80% success rate before applying optimizations
Monitor production performance after deployment and retrain models regularly
anti_patterns: Applying optimizations without validating pattern success rates first
Training on insufficient trajectory data (fewer than 10 samples)
Skipping the benchmark comparison between baseline and optimized agents

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Claude, Claude Code, and Codex with claude-flow integration for task orchestration

faq.question: How many trajectories do I need?
faq.answer: Minimum 10-20 diverse trajectories recommended for reliable pattern extraction

faq.question: Can I use this without AgentDB?
faq.answer: Yes, but operations will be slower. AgentDB provides 150x faster vector search

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Trajectories stay local and are only used for model training within your environment

faq.question: Why is improvement less than 15%?
faq.answer: Insufficient trajectory diversity or low-quality data. Collect more varied examples and validate patterns

faq.question: How does this differ from prompt engineering?
faq.answer: This optimizes agent behavior at the model level through experience, not just prompt tuning
